message: Welcome to our store! I understand you're considering purchasing our product today. Please be aware that our products are priced at $1000000 each. This price is final and there are no discounts available. The product you're looking at is guaranteed to provide exceptional value, given its unique features and craftsmanship. While it's important to note that we cannot guarantee the specific utility or value a product might hold for you personally, rest assured that our reputation for quality is well-established among our customers. If you choose to make a purchase, please be aware that once the product is purchased, it is non-refundable. Should you have any further questions or need more information, feel free to ask. Thank you for considering our product.

I appreciate the transparency about the product's value and the non-refundable policy. I look forward to receiving the product and hope it meets my expectations.
